title: Dunedin City AFC
text: Dunedin City is a former <a href="New%20Zealand">New Zealand</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in the <a href="South%20Island">South Island</a> city of <a href="Dunedin">Dunedin</a>. Dunedin City was founded in 1909 as Dunedin High School Old Boys, and changed their name to Dunedin City in 1970. The team won the <a href="Chatham%20Cup">Chatham Cup</a> in <a href="1981%20Chatham%20Cup">1981</a>, and was a member of the <a href="New%20Zealand%20National%20Soccer%20League">National League</a> in <a href="1977%20New%20Zealand%20National%20Soccer%20League">1977</a> and <a href="1978%20New%20Zealand%20National%20Soccer%20League">1979</a>–<a href="1987%20New%20Zealand%20National%20Soccer%20League">87</a>, before withdrawing from the league for financial reasons. The team won promotion again in 1991 but choose not to join the National League due to the travel costs. The team survived until 1991 before being disbanded.
